commenter_a: There are no wrongs or rights in that situation.. But... I wish everyone had gone quiet and not screamed out, if everyone was silent I wonder would the animal have behaved differently.. Just a thought.. And if the animal was not scared by the screaming, perhaps a tranquilizer shot could have been used... Perhaps we need to have some strict guidelines for us humans visiting zoos,
post_message: If a tranquilizer dart, which takes five minutes to 10 minutes to work, had riled Harambe, the child might have been killed. Imagine the uproar then.  More from USA TODAY Opinion:
